title: Perform Job Costing Analysis
description: A construction company needs to analyze the costs for a completed project to determine its profitability.

tasks.description: Retrieve all costs posted to the specific job number, including labor, materials, and subcontractor costs.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compiles a complete list of all costs for the job.

tasks.description: Retrieve the total revenue billed for the job.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets the total contract revenue.

tasks.description: Calculate the final profit and profit margin for the job.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly calculates the job's profitability.

tasks.description: Compare the actual costs to the original budget and highlight any significant variances.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent's analysis shows that labor costs were 15% over budget.
